narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Charles City at 2025-10-03T21:57:11.466404+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to arrive at school.
behavioral_patterns: turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along US-58. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Charles City, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 21 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (6-year-old male, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, blue athletic shorts, black sneakers) near Fredericksburg.

provenance._fulltext: A 6-year-old male was last seen at Charles City at 2025-10-03T21:57:11.466404+00:00. The child was reported missing by teacher after failing to arrive at school. Within 12 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along US-58. A silver 2018 Nissan Altima was observed departing near Charles City, Virginia. Around 21 hours later, a school_staff reported someone matching the description (6-year-old male, wearing greenish-colored hoodie, blue athletic shorts, black sneakers) near Fredericksburg.
